xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Indice dei Wiki platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Elimina platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=I Wiki
## Dependencies platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=Il componente java per la Gestione Spazi di Lavoro non è installato. Questa pagina non funzionerà correttamente. Assicuratevi che l'estensione "Workspace API" sia installata (usando la Gestione Estensioni) o che il file 'xwiki-platform-workspace-api-<version>.jar' sia presente nella cartella 'WEB-INF/lib/' delle applicazioni web (in caso d'installazione manuale). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).
## Create ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.button=Create Wiki platform.wiki.create.title=Crea un nuovo Wiki platform.wiki.create.members=MEMBRI platform.wiki.create.prettyname.empty=Il nome in chiaro non può essere vuoto platform.wiki.create.error=Creazione del Wiki "{0}" non riuscita\: {1}. platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.databasealreadyexists=Un database con questo identificatore esiste già platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.wikialreadyexists=Questo identificatore è già usato platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.empty=L'identificatore non può essere vuoto
## Common errors and messages platform.wiki.error.wikidoesnotexist=Il wiki {0} non esiste platform.wiki.error.oneParameterNotSpecified=Non è stato specificato il parametro "{0}". platform.wiki.error.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Sono accettati valori multipli. platform.wiki.error.exceptionWithMessage=Eccezione\: {0} platform.wiki.form.requiredField=Richiesto ### Missing: platform.wiki.csrf.error=Invalid security token. Please retry your operation.
## Users platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=L''utente {0}{1}{2} è già un membro del wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=L''utente {0}{1}{2} non è un membro del wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=Per continuare si deve prima fare il {0}log in{1}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=L''utente "{0}" ({1}) ha accettato l''invito ad iscriversi al wiki "{2}" ({3}). platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha accettato l''invito e si è iscritto con successo al wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha rifiutato con successo la richiesta d''iscrizione al wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=Questo wiki è solo a inviti. Per poter iscriversi, si deve ricevere un invito da uno degli amministratori. platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha già una richiesta in sospeso d''iscrizione al wiki {3}{4}{5}. Attendere che un amministratore del wiki la processi. platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Sicuri di voler annullare la richiesta di iscrizione al wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Sì platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=No platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha annullato con successo la richiesta d''iscrizione al wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=L''utente "{0}" ({1}) ha richiesto l''iscrizione al wiki "{2}" ({3}). platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha inviato con successo la richiesta d''iscrizione al wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Sicuri di volersi iscrivere al wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Sì platform.wiki.users.join.no=No platform.wiki.users.join.success=L''utente {0}{1}{2} si è iscritto con successo al wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=L''utente ''{0}{1}{2} è il proprietario del wiki {3}{4}{5}. Il proprietario del wiki non può lasciarlo a meno che il wiki sia eliminato o che cambi il proprietario. platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Sicuri di volersi cancellare dal wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Sì platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=No platform.wiki.users.leave.success=L''utente {0}{1}{2} ha lasciato con successo il wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.title=Iscriviti al Wiki platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Lascia il Wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Elimina il Wiki "{0}" ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.delete.empty=Delete Wiki platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=Un messaggio di risposta, visibile dall'amministratore del wiki, che si deve inviare per motivare la propria decisione. platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=Per iscriversi al wiki {0}{1}{2} si deve prima richiedere l''iscrizione. In seguito un amministratore esaminerà la richiesta e valuterà se accettarla o respingerla. platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=Un messaggio, visibile dall'amministratore del wiki, che si deve inviare per motivare la richiesta di iscrizione al wiki. platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=Siete stato invitato ad iscrivervi al wiki {0}{1}{2}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Messaggio d'Invito platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Risposta platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Accettazione platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Rifiuto ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Later ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Message ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Send Request ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Back

This action cannot be reverted! ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.retypeWikiId=Please repeat the identifier of the wiki here: ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.error.wikiIdDoesNotMatch=Type in the exact Wiki Identifier of the wiki that should be deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully deleted the wiki ''{3}''.

## Wizard ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=The domain name that will point to the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Template to use for this new wiki (all pages will be cloned). ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=A user who will always have all the rights on this wiki, independent of the rights configured in the Administration. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=The users who can participate in the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Step 1 — Choose a name ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Name ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Step 2 — Choose members ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Cleaning Up ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Clean & delete this wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=The wiki {0} has been successfuly deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Error, the wiki {0} has not been deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=You are about to delete wiki {0}. Please confirm. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Confirm ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=This wiki will be a template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=No template (default) ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=User Scope ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Select what kind of users can access the wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Flavor / Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Flavor or Template to use as the initial content of the new wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Flavor ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=After clicking on the "Create" button, the wiki will be created and the Distribution Wizard will be started in order to help you initialize your wiki. If you skip the wizard, your wiki will be empty. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Previous Step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Next step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Create
### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki creation ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Please wait until the wiki is created. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=The wiki {0} has been successfully created. You can now access it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.errorlog=However, error(s) have been generated during that process and you might want to review them. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=The creation of the wiki {0} failed. It''s recommended to delete it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.go=Go to the wiki
## Admin ### Missing: admin.wikis.description=Wikis management. ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates=Wiki Templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. ### Missing: admin.wikis.rights=Creation Right
## XWikiServer Sheet ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title=Descriptor of the wiki \"{0}\" ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasalreadynotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" already exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasdoesnotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" does not exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.settings=Wiki properties platform.wiki.sheet.title.createnewalias=Crea nuovi alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.viewaliases=View aliases ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.secure=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with \"https\". ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.port=The port to use for all this wiki's generated externals URLs. If not set it's inherited from the configuration and the main wiki. Only taken into account for domain based URLs. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.iswikitemplate=Indicate if this wiki can be used as a template when creating a new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.server=The alias used to access the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.description=A brief wiki description. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.homepage=The homepage of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.wikiprettyname=Pretty name ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.owner=Owner ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.secure=Secure (SSL) ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.port=Port ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.description=Description ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.server=Alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.homepage=Homepage ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.iswikitemplate=Wiki template ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor=This page defines how to access the \"{0}\" wiki, and some properties about it. For more configurations, please go to the ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=administration page of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.
